altername_name: Tele 7 Jeux Inedits: Mots Croises: La Selection des Meilleurs Mots Croises
name: Télé 7 Jeux Inédits: Mots Croisés
overview: TV 7 Games: Crosswords is a puzzle game on Nintendo DS. This app is an adaptation of the famous French games magazine Télé 7 Jeux. You can play more than 365 crossword puzzles, all classified according to three levels of difficulty. So to your styluses!
